title: Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses, Android TV Smart Glasses with 360" Micro-OLED Display, Google Play, Media Streaming, HDCP Support & Cloud Gaming, Console, Android, iOS, Windows Compatible
descriptions:
**Experience the Future of Entertainment with Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses**

Immerse yourself in a world of limitless entertainment with the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses. These cutting-edge, Android TV-powered smart glasses offer a stunning 360" Micro-OLED display, weighing in at just 75g, providing an unparalleled viewing experience.

**Unlock Endless Content Possibilities**

Enjoy seamless access to your favorite streaming services, including Hulu, Disney+, and Peacock, as well as the entire Google Play library. With HDCP support and Android TV 12, you can stream your favorite shows and movies in stunning clarity.

**Game Without Limits**

Take your gaming experience to the next level with cloud gaming support, allowing you to play your favorite games on any device, anywhere. Whether you're a console gamer or a PC enthusiast, the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses have got you covered.

**Comfort and Convenience**

Designed with eye comfort in mind, these glasses boast T端V Rheinland certification and a diopter adjustment range of 0.00D to -6.00D, ensuring a comfortable fit for every user. With USB-C, HDMI adapter, and wireless adapter connectivity options, you can connect to your device of choice with ease.

**Compatibility Guaranteed**

Whether you're an Android, iOS, or Windows user, the Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses are compatible with your device, making it easy to integrate into your existing ecosystem.

**Upgrade Your Entertainment Experience Today**

Don't miss out on the opportunity to revolutionize your entertainment experience. Get your Rokid AR Joy Pack AR Glasses now and discover a world of limitless possibilities.
